# `EdgeMetricsDisk` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| availableBytes | `number` | No | Available memory in bytes. |
| partitionName | `string` | No | Disk partition name. |
| totalBytes | `number` | No | Total memory in bytes. |
